meanings.sent1: He daggered the target in the movie scene.
meanings.sent2: The assassin daggered his victim silently.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully daggered the cake with a chocolate dagger decoration.
meanings.sent4: Her words daggered his heart, leaving him in emotional pain.
meanings.sent5: The image of the daggered apple was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: Having the shape or appearance of a dagger.
meanings.sent1: The daggered leaves of the plant looked sharp and pointed.
meanings.sent2: The daggered shadows on the wall added a mysterious touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The daggered design on the shield made it look fierce and intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The daggered mountain peaks pierced the sky in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The daggered symbol on the flag symbolized strength and power.
